body: Kana is definitely best girl. Gives him all of her firsts, and then after he gets her pregnant she sets him up to give stud services to two other hot girls and possibly knock them up. She must really love him, helping him spread his seed like that. A super attractive, naughty yet faithful girl who not only willingly has a guy's babies, but also  actively supports him having unprotected sex with other women that will probably result in them also getting pregnant... that's a guy's ultimate fantasy. He better make sure he knocks up Kana the most and spoils her a ton while she's pregnant to show his appreciation.
